## Resources.IDeltaGeneratorOptions.resourceIds property

Array of specific resource IDs to include in delta generation. If not provided, generates deltas for all resources in the delta resolver.

**Signature:**

```typescript
resourceIds?: ReadonlyArray<string>;
```
